On Wed, 07 Mar 2001 02:22:06 -0000 Yanshosh@... wrote:
>Um, Sparrow, Dinobot is Carnage's character. In order for your 
>characters to have anything to do with his outside the RPG, you need 
>to ask his permission.
>
>
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Linda locke" <sparrow@d...> wrote:
>> On Tue, 06 Mar 2001 22:51:49 -0000 RYO D <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
>> >((Sorry if I missed anything big yan please tell whats going on. I 
>had to go 
>> >to this awards banquet for day school and changed my Internet 
>provider. The 
>> >reason none of my characters have Bios is because for a while me 
>and friend 
>> >have be reading books on animation and studying it in my art 
>class. So I 
>> >going to Try ((Try Being the key word)) to animate a 3 minute 
>short for my 
>> >bios one for each characters. But to see if this works the way I 
>want I'm 
>> >going to try to do a general music video for the Neo Beast Wars. 
>This is 
>> >long time taking process which means with day school, night 
>school, work, 
>> >and mischief, the two of us will be working on this in our spare 
>time. But 
>> >before I start I want to ask permission to animate and draw your 
>characters 
>> >for the general Music Video. The characters that get picked we 
>will be 
>> >listed and we are picking by the Bios you posted on the Web site 
>if your bio 
>> >reads well enough to draw you then your character may get picked. 
>If you 
>> >don't want to be drawn say so and you will not be picked. 
>Characters that 
>> >are drawn will be drawn in a drawn by Gene in Transformers G1 
>style or with 
>> >strong anime edge by me. Before I start if I make this and it is 
>decent will 
>> >you add it to the page Yan?))
>> >
>> >
>> >::The WildCats::
>> >All of the Wild C.A.T.S enter stealth mode and fall back to Cats 
>Layer.
>> >
>> 
>>_____________________________________________________________________

>http://www.hotmail.com.

>> 
>> sure why not I've got some made up BW characters you can use. And 
>they are:
>> 
>> Maximal Blossom
>> gender:female
>> alternate form:pink and white car 
>> Backround:She and Dinobot have known each other since they were 
>kids and in the process fallen in love with other. They now have a 
>son name Buddy.She's also good friends with Rinox,and Optimus. 
>> 
>> Maximal Butterfreak
>> gender:female
>> beast form:butterfly
>> Backround:Dinobots 'sister'. When Butterfreak was still a protoform 
>her original spark faded 'cause of a mis-fired blast. Dinobot was the 
>only one on the scene,and so he willing gave half his spark to her. 
>So the two are in a way brother and sister because of the spark they 
>now share.   
>> 
>> Maximal Buddy 
>> gender:male
>> Alternate form(s):grey and white car and helicopter
>> backround:the off spring of Blossom and Dinobot. Buddy wanted a bat 
>beast form but his father disagreed saying it would be too dagerous. 
>Born during the beast wars (first season near the end) Buddy wanted 
>at first to grow up like any other normal kid but was stuck where he 
>was. After the beast wars had ended Buddy got the chance to know 
>Cybertron,unlike earth which he calls home.
>>
